channel.title: The Word Association Game
channel.description:
RULES: I will type a word/phrase. The first person that replies will reply with another word/phrase that is similar in any way to the first word. Then the next person will reply with a word relating to that word, and so on. The only main rules are that the word/phrase must be similar to the last word on the thread so far.
Lets begin.
The first word is: Black Mesa
